thread.title: Hamilton men die in head-on smash on State Highway 1 near Karapiro
thread.title_full: Hamilton men die in head-on smash on State Highway 1 near Karapiro

author: Phillipa Yalden
title: Hamilton men die in head-on smash on State Highway 1 near Karapiro
text:
Hamilton men die in head-on smash on State Highway 1 near Karapiro PHILLIPA YALDEN Last updated 12:44, February 4 2017 DOMINICO ZAPATA/FAIRFAX NZ 
One of the two cars involved in Friday's double fatal crash on SH1. 
Two men who died in a head-on smash alongside their dog in Waikato on Friday were Hamilton locals. 
Police expected to release their names sometime on Saturday. 
The pair, aged in their 20s and 30s, were killed in a crash on State Highway 1 near the Tauranga turnoff, near Karapiro, on SH29 at 9.50am on Friday. DOMINICO ZAPATA/FAIRFAX NZ 
Two men died in a collision on State Highway 1 near the SH29 intersection. 
The driver of the other car involved in the smash was taken to Waikato Hospital in a moderate condition. 
READ MORE: Two dead after blackspot crash 
Initial indications show the vehicles were travelling in opposite directions when they crashed head-on on SH1 about 10 metres from the intersection, Senior Sergeant Pete van de Wetering said. 
"It is a timely reminder to everyone to slow down, pay attention, drive to conditions and don't be distracted by anything on the roads." 
The crash on the busy 100kmh stretch of highway between Hamilton and Tauranga was shut down until 4pm. 
Next of kin have been notified, police said.
